refinement.text: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by -value0-%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by -value1-%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

Increases ATK by -value0-% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by -value1-%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by -value0-. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by -value1- and increases ATK by -value2-%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.
Increases CRIT DMG by -value0-%. Hits have a -value1-% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every -value2-s.

Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by -value0-%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further -value1-% every 0.1 seconds the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by -value0-% every second up to a max of -value1-%. When the character is on the field for more than -value2-s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4% per second until it reaches 0%.

Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing -value0-% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every -value1-s.
Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by -value0-%.
After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a -value0-% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every -value1-s.
Increases Normal Attack DMG by -value0-% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.
Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by -value0-%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

refinement.text: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by -value0-% for 10s.

For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by -value0-%. A maximum of -value1-% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.
Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by -value0-% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by -value1-% for 5s.
Increases Normal Attack DMG by -value0-% and Charged Attack DMG by -value1-%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
CRIT hits have a -value0-% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every -value1-s.
Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by -value0-% and Normal ATK SPD by -value1-% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by -value0-% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by -value0-% for 6s.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by -value0-%.

Charged Attack hits on weak spots deal an additional -value0-% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
Increases DMG against weak spots by -value0-%.
If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by -value0-%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.
Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by -value0-%.
